summary:
Ford has a new patent application for a system where cars monitor each other’s speeds, and then report then to some central authority. 
Slashdot thread.
title: New Patent Application for Car-to-Car Surveillance

summary: I like listening to podcasts.  In particular, I’ve been binging Dungeons & Daddies[1] for the last few weeks.  To speed things up, I subscribed to the Patreon to get the ad-free episodes, but along with those you also get loads of other content...
title: Filtering podcast feeds

summary: A review of the past week
title: Sunday Review (08-04-2024)

summary:
In answer to Jedda's post today, The Plan To Not Have A Plan, I wrote:

I find plans never go to plan, it's best to have an outline written in pencil, maybe on a napkin that can be toss in the recycle if necessary when it all goes to hell in a hand basket . 

Because invariably, I always end up tossing the plan in the bin, or it gets lost, forgotten, trodden on, eaten by the cat (oh, wait, we don't have a cat) or covered in coffee stains so that it's unreadable.  Upshot is, plans never work out and while I love making them, and thinking about their execution, it's an exercise in futility that while fun and distracting as they are, serve no real purpose other than to remind me, Life Happens...
title: What Plan?

summary: My approach to posting for Blaugust 2024 is to not have a plan, and topics you may read about this month
title: The Plan to Not Have a Plan
